description: Balaji Enterprises was incorporated to manufacture and export a complete range of Bean Bag and Bean associated furniture. It belongs to a 40-year old business group from India. With a passion and dedication to give the highest quality products at the most competitive cost(most importantly at the right time) Balaji Enterprises, today has become the "preferred vendor" for most of its clients around the globe for bean related furniture products. Balaji Enterprises today also is a also a leading importer of branded and unbranded tableware mainly Crockery, Glassware, Cutlery, Giftware, Home Decor items and other household items, Their experience, dedication and focus enables them to source high quality materials from India while eliminating some of the "conventional risks" associated with imports.
